description: Try our easy to follow Healthy Lentil Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Healthy Lentil Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Wash all your vegetables and set aside
Add your tin of lentils to the large bowl. Make sure you have drained and rinsed them
Then add the parsley and coriander. Make sure you have chopped the parsley and coriander before adding to the bowl. I used curly parsley but flat leaf works well too
Add your diced tomato to the bowl
Add your diced cucumber to the bowl
Now crumble your feta over all the ingredients in the bowl
Add the juiced lemon and olive oil. Salt to taste
Now mix all the ingredients lightly and add to a serving bowl. Enjoy! This dish works well as a side with grilled meat or perfect as a stand alone dish.
